testcase.classname: System should allow that user to login
testcase.name: Warning messages should be displayed when logging in with an invalid email or password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to "N11Url" page............................................passed Then Opens the Login page...................................................passed Given User enters "invalidEmail" at the email textbox and verifies that invalid email warning message is displayed.passed Then User enters "invalidPassword" at the password textbox and verifies that invalid password warning message is displayed.passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed

testcase.classname: System should allow that user to login
testcase.name: If user logs in successfully, the home page should open and username should be displayed on the Homepage.
